description: This file defines a React functional component named Sidebar, which renders a collapsible sidebar with a list of categories. It includes state management for toggle behavior and handles user interactions for category selection.

methods.name: Sidebar({ title = "Categories", categories = [], onSelect })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a collapsible sidebar with category buttons.
